website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ XL2720Z is designed for gamers and loaded with features. It's a bit more expensive than a typical 27-inch monitor, but if extreme gaming performance is what you're after, it's money well spent.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good monitor with lots of gaming features
customer_reviews.text: It's a good monitor with lots of gaming features. The high refresh rate definitely helped in fast pace FPS games (like CSGO). I really like the feature this screen has which brighten up dark corners. The colour is not the the best and my biggest gripe is the viewing angle, when I lay down on my chair to watch movies, the top of the screen will become really dark. I only spent 30% of my time playing FPS games, so I can not justify the reason to keep this screen, but this is definitely the best screen for CSGO Pros!
customer_reviews.author: Truth to be told

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise seems very good quality, sturdy and great picture
customer_reviews.text: Has issues turning on and off a year after use and it does it randomly sometimes multiple times a day. Lights on the side of the monitor can flash annoyingly for no reason. Both are fixed by unplugging and then replugging it in after 10 seconds or until the front power switch is not lit which can take 5 seconds to dim. Otherwise seems very good quality, sturdy and great picture, can be rotated and very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was bought to replace my older 24" LG 3D monitor, which in itself was a very good quality monitor, but this is far better screen quality and of course a bigger 27" 3D monitor. As stated this is a quality screen and a lot cheaper than some other makes that I was not awilling to pay so much for as it was a must have requirement of 3D.
customer_reviews.author: R.A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Display quality is excellent, no faults or disruptions, a little fiddly when it comes to getting the refresh rate to maximum, keeps returning to default 60Hz refresh on desktop system restart, but apart from that, colours are fantastic, details are incredible, excellent price for what you're getting. Definitely recommend for a high spec gaming display at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Aroth63

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this monitor enough praise to do it justice. Seriously the best thing i've ever bought from amazon. I've had it for ages and i'm still blown away by the quality of it. It's a bargain at twice the price. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Ploppers

customer_reviews.title: Its only been a few days but I've not been disappointed. It arrived quickly and was easy to set ...
customer_reviews.text: BenQ XL2720Z 27-inch LED Gaming Monitor. I've been needing a new monitor after buying a new PC recently, and after some researching opted for this one. Its only been a few days but I've not been disappointed. It arrived quickly and was easy to set up, I've not played with many settings yet but I've played Crysis 3 at max settings and it looks gorgeous. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: David Browning

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for proper competitive gaming but not worth it for normal users.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade from a 27inch Samsung one now I'm starting to game more. I can't really see a difference to be honest. The colours are slightly worse as this one is TN and my other one is IPS. I can't really feel any kind of difference for gaming with any of the features. I'd save yourself a bit of money and get a normal monitor unless you're super into gaming and really care about the few ms edge this will give you.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Burdett

customer_reviews.title: image is ok, but the control interface (pseudo mouse) ...
customer_reviews.text: image is ok, but the control interface (pseudo mouse) is awful. As is the touch interface built into the bevel, far too often is doesn't recognise a touch, I have to press hard and this moves my triples out of alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Neal P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in its first guise and lower price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing in its first guise and lower price. the rebranding and higher price makes it one to consider highly, though there maybe better monitors in the higher price range.
customer_reviews.author: MechaGamera

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor, only only real complaint is that there is no quick way to switch inputs - it always requires a few steps of button presses first, which is annoying when you just want to switch between a PC and console for example.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ciaran M. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from me :D
customer_reviews.text: Huge, Fast, and very very Sexy! Bit on the expensive side but well worth it for such a good gaming monitor.The bracket is very customisable allowing free movement up, down and around. Works extremely well in both 2D and 3D modes along side the Nividia 3D Vision 2 glasses (separate purchase...)
customer_reviews.author: MintyMods

customer_reviews.title: High quality gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the above monitor for gaming and never regretted my choice. I can recomend this monitor to everyone. Best regards.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Good for gaming and no-stress for the eyes after long gaming sessions, but bad view angles for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Will start with the Cons: View angles are pretty bad for the price. Big stand that provides good stability and it's easy to grab it and move the monitor around. Very good for the eyes, no stress at all and a lot of connection options.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful monitor, no complaints aside from the fact the screen is quite bright and this takes a while to get used to. Other than that though, this 144hz monitor is great for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Vex

customer_reviews.title: The images are clear and sharp and the controls are really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Makes a real difference compared to the monitors and HD TV's I've used. The images are clear and sharp and the controls are really easy to use. Well worth investing in.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Dick

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant monitor. Fast response, high refresh rate, very robust and clean looking. Only downsides, hence the 4 stars, would be that the pixel density is somewhat low and individual pixels are visible when sitting close. I recommend highly for competitive gaming however if your looking for visuals over performance I would go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: im still s***e at cod, but the monitor is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, after few adjustments very good screen
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, after few adjustments very good screen, good colours, great 144Hz refresh rate and blur reduction is just perfect for games. Good to watch movies too.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: great monitor, worth the price within budget
customer_reviews.text: Pros Fast Delivery Quality Great Great Price Portable 'but i have no friendsfor lan gaming ect' :( All in all, it is well worth it Cons Count the pixels, so its noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: S. LEA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, if you are after a gaming monitor then look no further guys....its epic. Roll on Star Citizen...
customer_reviews.author: George2772

customer_reviews.title: ... monitor with a refresh rate above 60hz and i love it no going back for me now i used ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my first monitor with a refresh rate above 60hz and i love it no going back for me now i used to use a 1440p ips 60hz screen but the higher refresh rate of this monitor made me go back to 1080p its such a better experience especially with fps games
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Giles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would like to buy another one just because this is really cool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic screen
customer_reviews.text: Installs and sets up easily, the base is good and solid requiring virtually no pressure to move to your desired position. The image quality is pretty amazing for game playing. The software provided is good for using predefined pre-sets, and you can use the image display calibration of course in Windows as well. All in all a fantastic screen.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: ... on my 42 inch tv for shooters it's the best you can get makes easier to focus no input ...
customer_reviews.text: im loving this monitor its worth every penny in fact since the day i had the monitor i haven't played on my 42 inch tv for shooters it's the best you can get makes easier to focus no input lag really impressed with what i got
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, at a price
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault it, works great, big and lovely looking images. Compared to what you get for 200 quid its prob worth the extra. Easy to set up. Recommended. Nb, Amazon also delivered very quickly to me in Northern Ireland.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Campbell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: be warned if you play cs go and use stretched 4:3 resolution it is quite a faff on to get with this monitor using win 10 and AMD. apart from that all good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: best monitor
customer_reviews.text: Xmas present for my son, he thinks is the best picture he has ever seen and he's had quite a few monitors he spends almost all his spare time on his pc and said he very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Mcbroom

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Beast !!!
customer_reviews.text: got this for my little brother and I have to say I was very very impressed. Great picture,great response time absolute beast.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Al-Hashimi

customer_reviews.title: seriously good monitor, took me a while to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: seriously good monitor , took me a while to get it running at 144 hz but once worked out how its amazing
customer_reviews.author: mute

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen in every way
customer_reviews.text: Excellent screen in every way. The stand is robust, stylish and allows the screen to be set just how you want. The display is bright, sharp and doesn't struggle to display even the fastest pace games on screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gruddle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor works absolutely great, it's adjustable, perfect image, and has a nice light sensitive button interface on the right side of the screen. Would have been helpful to have come with a displayport though
customer_reviews.author: Shane McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line monitor, only issue is the Display Port cable that came with the monitor broke after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant monitor, best ive ever used and it runs fps games so smooth you see enemies before they see you with 144mhz 1ms
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to set up. simple plug and play wiring. Fantastic clarity of picture. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Never had anything above 60hz, and oh my.... It is constructed very well and colours are very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged easy to build and plenty of settings to muck around ...
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged easy to build and plenty of settings to muck around with. Movies and pictures are clear and sharp and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: robert goodall

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and is a amazing looking mointor. The reason 4 stars is because as I opened the box the dvi cable was missing. As a gamer the only thing they missed was the cable I need.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Second one is good..
customer_reviews.text: Had to send first one back for a replacement as it arrived broken. Second one is good ...so far
customer_reviews.author: Andriy Melnik

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I miss is the larger vertical resolution from previous monitors, but it's bright and contrasty, and the 3d is fun in games that support it
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing great picture quality especially for PC and console gaming would recommend to gamers
customer_reviews.author: jabeen chaudhry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really good monitor, using it for pc and ps3 gaming :)
customer_reviews.author: christopher tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, as expected from the price but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Forerunner

customer_reviews.title: Working perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as expected - a terrific product! I would gladly recommend it to anyone looking for a high quality gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Frederik Kruuse

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Use it for Gaming. Great colors, easy to calibrate and set up. Worth the price. Doesn't get 5 stars only because of the price
customer_reviews.author: João Ascenso

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. It got here no trouble at all. Is just what I paid for. 5 Star!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Simply great, a high end gaming monitor which amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Simply great, a high end gaming monitor which amazingly, due to high refresh rates and other wizardry reduces eye strain. Excellent quality and playing games at 144Hz makes for a beautiful gaming experience, no bluring, shadowing or other screen issues. Remember to forget about HDMI, it's capped at 60 Hz use the included DVI adapter to link from monitor to video card and adjust the screen to 144hz.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great monitor with some minorities
customer_reviews.text: In all I can't deny this is a great monitor, truly one of the best I've had the pleasure of still using. However it's unfortunate that the monitor utilises touch-sense buttons in order to operate. (Not including the button controller) This may not seem like an issue but it isn't always accurate and sometime it does take multiple attempts, issues mostly occur when the monitor is currently off! It's also worth mentioning that this monitor can take a couple of seconds longer to turn on that the standard monitor (this being full resolution at 144hz). Overall I have to say the image quality is awesome and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkbytes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, much bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, much bigger than expected. Was worried about reviews about it being low quality and adjusting the settings, the settings do need to be adjusted but the quality was better than expected. Brightness 75 Contrast 43 Color temp, User mode, R 100 G 98 B 96 Picture mode, standard Low blue light, off blur reduction, off
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy cooper

customer_reviews.title: My son is very pleased with this product which is used for general day ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is very pleased with this product which is used for general day to day use and more importantly for gaming. Picture quality is excellent. Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: So smooth and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Got this in an Amazon warehouse deal for £200, absolutely top class gaming monitor. No motion blur, incredible mhz and just makes everything look so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I will love it, I will....
customer_reviews.text: I will love it, I will.... It is my Xmas gift so I didn't unpack it yet. Everyone is worry about firmware however on the box production date is Jun 2015 so I should be fine! Cant wait until 25th!
customer_reviews.author: C4rloS

customer_reviews.title: Great for its price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is really good I can play games on it all day and not suffer eye strain, I think the the colours are good to say it's a TN panel. Shame it doesn't have g sync but it's still great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought one of these for my son. He really ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my son. He really rates the product. Only four stars as I feel it was a little expensive for what it was.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really Love it. Even tho its expenisve its worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Krzysztof

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor (not a tv screen) spot on for games such as counter strike and battlefield series
customer_reviews.author: Oliver B.

customer_reviews.title: Mind blowung
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor lives up to all expectations and then some
customer_reviews.author: Jordan gallie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a gift for son good quality great size .
customer_reviews.author: Den30

customer_reviews.title: Really cannot believe how good this thing actually is
customer_reviews.text: Really cannot believe how good this thing actually is. If you've got a decent gfx card (I have a GTX780) it's going to be worth every penny, 144hz topline (most monitors are 59/60hz) I used to think the white background on webpages such as this one for example were white, the thing is when you see webpages on this thing then you really will know what white is. Superb range of resolutions for gaming and no lag at all. Got a proper gfx card? Get one of these. I spent ages deciding and it's superb knowing that being fussy was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: out 4 zero

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning monitor, using it for call of duty black ops 3 on ps4 and is stunning picture quality. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
